tool_description: Processes approved returned items back into inventory and updates stock levels across systems.

inspection_report_id.description: ID from completed condition inspection report

items_to_restock.description: SKUs of items approved for restocking

destination_warehouse.description: Warehouse code where items will be restocked

error_messages: Invalid inspection report ID: Report not found or not approved for restocking.
Items not approved for restock: One or more items were not cleared for inventory return.
Invalid warehouse code: Destination warehouse not found in system.
Inventory system unavailable: Cannot connect to inventory management system.
Stock level update failed: Unable to update inventory quantities.
usage: Provide inspection_report_id, items_to_restock array, destination_warehouse, and restock_timestamp. Tool updates inventory levels and marks items as available for sale.

updated_stock_levels.description: New inventory quantities for restocked items

restock_status.description: Overall restocking status: completed, partial, failed
